item.title: A Super Quick Introduction to the Fediverse and Mastodon
item.description: There are lots of guides explaining Fediverse and Mastodon, but most of them go into way too much detail. With this post, I would like to try and cover all, or at least most, of the basics you’ll need to know to get started. You can then gradually learn the rest from elsewhere. The fediverse is NOT f**king twitter !! The fediverse is very different from twitter, and that’s by design.
